text: The Asset is an upcoming American action thriller film, directed by Martin Campbell and written by Richard Wenk. It stars Michael Keaton, Samuel L. Jackson and Maggie Q. It is scheduled to be released on April 23, 2021, by Lionsgate. ==Cast== * Michael Keaton as Rembrandt * Samuel L. Jackson as Moody Dutton * Maggie Q as Anna Dutton ==Production== In October 2017, it was announced that Gong Li had joined the cast of the film, then titled Ana, with Martin Campbell directing from a screenplay by Richard Wenk. In November 2019, it was announced Michael Keaton, Samuel L. Jackson and Maggie Q had joined the cast of the film. Principal photography began in January 2020. Filming took place in Bucharest, London and Da Nang. ==Release== It is scheduled to be released on April 23, 2021. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2021 films Category:American films Category:American action thriller films Category:Films directed by Martin Campbell Category:Films shot in Bucharest Category:Films shot in London Category:Films shot in Vietnam Category:Lionsgate films Category:2020s action thriller films
title: The Asset (film)
